colorTheory.description: This color palette combines classic black and white with a vibrant teal accent for a professional yet modern look.
colorTheory.mood: The colors convey sophistication, modernity, and trustworthiness.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between black text and white background ensures readability, with teal providing a pop of color for emphasis.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: Black and white create a timeless and elegant base, while teal adds a refreshing and energetic contrast.
